article.title: DRUG-FIGHTING MARINES TO SECURE MEXICAN BORDER

title_result: HEARING OF THE HOMELAND SECURITY SUBCOMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE APPROPRIATIONS COMMITTEE;SUBJECT: "CONFRONTING THE CARTELS: ADDRESSING U.S.-MEXICAN BORDER SECURITY";CHAIRED BY: REPRESENTATIVE DAVID E. PRICE (D-NC);WITNESSES: MARIKO SILVER, PRINCIPAL DEPUTY ASSISTANT SECRETARY FOR POLICY, DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY; JAYSON AHERN, ACTING COMMISSIONER, U.S. CUSTOMS AND BORDER PROTECTION (CBP); JOHN MORTON, ASSISTANT SECRETARY FOR U.S. IMMIGRATION AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT (ICE);LOCATION: 2359 RAYBURN HOUSE OFFICE BUILDING, WASHINGTON, D.C.
